Actions.Name: Buy a shipment label (V1)
Actions.Description: Buy and retrieve information about a shipping label.

Actions.Name: Create a shipment
Actions.Description: Creates and retrieves the information about a shipment.

Actions.Name: Delete a shipment (V1)
Actions.Description: Delete and receive confirmation of a shipment deletion.

Actions.Name: Get a shipment
Actions.Description: Get the details of a shipment.

Actions.Name: Get available pickup slots (V1)
Actions.Description: Available pickup slots will be calculated for a specific courier, in local time and for the coming 7 days. A pickup can then be requested using the "Request pickup" action.

Actions.Name: Get item categories
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of shipment categories and the slug to use the category.

Actions.Name: Get rates and taxes
Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of shipping quotes for a prospective shipment.

Actions.Name: Get tracking status
Actions.Description: Retrieves the tracking status of a shipment.

Actions.Name: List all boxes
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of all available courier boxes.

Actions.Name: List all shipments
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of all shipments.

Actions.Name: Request a pickup (V1)
Actions.Description: When a pickup is created, a pickup request will be made directly to the courier, which will return a reference number. The reference number may be used when contacting the customer service of the courier. A pickup slot must be chosen; upcoming pickup slots may be found using the "Get available pickup slots" action.

Actions.Name: Update warehouse state
Actions.Description: Update a shipment's warehouse state. Only available for shipments fulfilled at one of the Easyship integrated warehouses.
